name: Hate Free Heroes RPG 2.0
description: Hate Free Heroes is a modern day role playing game that takes the player into the role of an H.F.H agent and researcher dedicated to decreasing the rise of "Aggromites" in the city.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10 Processor: Pentium 4 or 1.80 GHz equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
